hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\blueE6$ tens and $\blueE8$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/aff07acc257d120e8bedca87c77a36d031ac669d)

There are $\blueE{68}$ blocks.

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD2$ tens and $\maroonD{2}$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/2c0f7fb8760b73d1b1908e5ca114ad1846e59b5a)

So, we are subtracting $\maroonD{22}$ blocks.

When we subtract $\blueE{68}-\maroonD{22}$, the difference is $\blueE{46}$ blocks.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/5ea3a0c3e94c44f0391ffa6591ac21ea50e6acd6)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$68- 22 = 46$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/4945da619535048716071c8fdcff5a3b5434bb8e)

[[☃ radio 1]]
